## WorkspaceSvg.registerButtonCallback() method

Register a callback function associated with a given key, for clicks on buttons and labels in the flyout. For instance, a button specified by the XML <button text="create variable" callbackKey="CREATE_VARIABLE"></button> should be matched by a call to registerButtonCallback("CREATE\_VARIABLE", yourCallbackFunction).

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerButtonCallback(key: string, func: (p1: FlyoutButton) => void): void;
```
